content: watermelon keychain materials ❖ caricia nature yarn fruit color pink or red white black and rind color green tone ❖ plastic or metallic needle ❖ keyring or keychain ❖ 3 5 mm hook e and optional a 2 5 mm to make the chains for the keyring ❖ optional a stitch marker stitches to know ❖ slip_stitch → slip_stitch ❖ single_crochet → single_crochet single_crochet 2 → single_crochet twice into different stitches ❖ increase → increase ❖ magic_ring → magic_ring ❖ chain → chain instructions this pattern is in us terminology any instructions between are to be repeated until the end of the round unless otherwise indicated if you have any questions please don t hesitate to contact me via etsy or e-mail flutterhoney shop@gmail com i ll be more than happy to help you watermelon r1 in the fruit color magic_ring single_crochet 6 close magic_ring r2 increase all around r3 single_crochet increase all around r4 increase single_crochet 2 all around change to white r5 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet all around change to rind color r6 single_crochet increase single_crochet 3 all around slip_stitch into the first stitch of r6 and cut the yarn leaving a long tail last instructions ❖ fold the watermelon in half and sew the sides together before completely closing the hole add a bit of stuffing so the watermelon looks plump ❖ join yarn to the top of one of the sides and make a loop ❖ chain 12 insert the keyring and then join back to the stitch you attached the yarn sew the end to the watermelon firmly ❖ sew the seeds on ❖ weave in the tails and you re done enjoy it and be sure to tell us how you liked this pattern by posting a review we appreciate all your support and love
